import React, { Component } from 'react'; class Items extends Component { render(props) { let usersFollowersNumOfFollowers = this.props.state.usersFollowersNumOfFollowers let usersFollowersNumOfRepos = this.props.state.usersFollowersNumOfRepos let usersReposNumOfFollowers = this.props.state.usersReposNumOfFollowers let usersReposNumOfRepos = this.props.state.usersReposNumOfRepos let reposJavascriptNumOfFollowers = this.props.state.reposJavascriptNumOfFollowers let reposJavascriptNumOfRepos = this.props.state.reposJavascriptNumOfRepos let reposJavaNumOfFollowers = this.props.state.reposJavaNumOfFollowers let reposJavaNumOfRepos = this.props.state.reposJavaNumOfRepos let reposPythonNumOfFollowers = this.props.state.reposPythonNumOfFollowers let reposPythonNumOfRepos = this.props.state.reposPythonNumOfRepos let reposPhpNumOfFollowers = this.props.state.reposPhpNumOfFollowers let reposPhpNumOfRepos = this.props.state.reposPhpNumOfRepos let itemsToShow = this.props.state.itemsToShow let kind = this.props.kind let battle =this.props.state.battle if (battle) return
BATTLE!
if (!itemsToShow) return null if (kind === "usersFollowers" || kind === "usersRepos") { return ( itemsToShow.map( (item, index) =>
{item.login}

Followers: {kind === "usersFollowers" ? usersFollowersNumOfFollowers[index] : usersReposNumOfFollowers[index]}

Repositories: {kind === "usersFollowers" ? usersFollowersNumOfRepos[index] : usersReposNumOfRepos}

Account
) ) } if (kind === "reposJavascript" || kind === "reposJava" || kind === "reposPython" || kind === "reposphp") { return ( itemsToShow.map( (item, index) =>
{item.login}

Followers: {kind === "reposJavascript" ? reposJavascriptNumOfFollowers[index] : kind === "reposJava" ? reposJavaNumOfFollowers[index] : kind === "reposPython" ? reposPythonNumOfFollowers[index] : reposPhpNumOfFollowers[index]}

Repositories: {kind === "reposJavascript" ? reposJavascriptNumOfRepos[index] : kind === "reposJava" ? reposJavaNumOfRepos[index] : kind === "reposPython" ? reposPythonNumOfRepos[index] : reposPhpNumOfRepos[index]}

Go somewhere
) ) } } } export default Items;
